ygData.subject: RE: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You know how when you use an AE song around other players (non-party members), the light effects show up on them and they get the [bard] tries to cast a
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Can you elaborate on what you said below? This is the first time I've ever
> our AE songs affecting other groups invisibility.

You know how when you use an AE song around other players
(non-party members), the light effects show up on them and
they get the "[bard] tries to cast a spell on you but you are
protected" message? Well, apparently one of the side effects
of this is that mobs can see them when this happens even if
they are invisible.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
